title: Oscar Pistorius Guilty Of Culpable Homicide In Girlfiend's Death
teaser: A judge in South Africa has found the double-amputee athlete guilty of culpable homicide, or negligent killing, in the shooting death of his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp in 2013.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
